title: AddSubordinate (Method)
text:
METHOD AddSubordinate : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Adds a subordinate (given by a BACnet-Object-Reference) and a subordinate anotation to the Subordinate_List-Property and
the Subordinate_Annotations-Property of this BACnet-Object. Both the subordinate and its annotation are added simulatenously by
this function.

rows.Name: deviceInstance
rows.Comment: The device to reference by the subordinate

rows: The object instance number to reference by the subordinate.
The object type to reference by the subordiante.
Whether the device is present or not.
The annotation (comment) for the subordinate added.
